name: ★ East Boston Fantastic Room Located by Airport ★
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in East Boston, here is the link to the Airbnb guide to the neighborhood: www.airbnb.com/locations/boston/east-boston . An old Italian neighborhood of Boston with the current demographic consisting of Italian and Latin Americans primarily from Central and South America.
description:
Welcome!

Spacious room with a queen size bed, walking distance to the Airport and just 2 stops on the Metro to Downtown.
PLEASE NOTE:
• Set of stairs leading to house and room
• One shared bathroom and a half bath
• Poor noise isolation in room
• Self check-in and self check-out for your convenience via a smart lock
• 6 minute walk to the blue line subway
• Easy access to the I90 & I93 Highway
• Restaurants, bars, Shaw's (groceries), 24/7 CVS and Walgreens within 5 min walking distance

The space
Recently renovated, gorgeous modern house with a great open layout.

This room is on the 2nd floor and requires you to go up a flight of stairs. Please note that you're renting a single private bedroom within a larger house.

There are several private bedrooms in the house - most of which are used by other Airbnb guests, so you'll be in good company.

The living room provides a great place
